title: libobs: deadlock between threads while saving a scene.
body:
### Operating System Info

macOS 14

### Other OS

_No response_

### OBS Studio Version

29.1.3

### OBS Studio Version (Other)

_No response_

### OBS Studio Log URL

OBS hangs and log file doesn't show this.

### OBS Studio Crash Log URL

_No response_

### Expected Behavior

Saving scene should not cause OBS hangs.

### Current Behavior

deadlock between graphics thread and main thread while saving a scene.

### Steps to Reproduce

I got the callstack here:
```
main thread
0   libsystem_kernel.dylib              0x0000000183baebc8 __psynch_mutexwait + 8
1   libsystem_pthread.dylib             0x0000000183be90c4 _pthread_mutex_firstfit_lock_wait + 84
2   libsystem_pthread.dylib             0x3406000183be6a5c _pthread_mutex_firstfit_lock_slow + 3748683739832516856
3   libobs                              0x777b000105831898 scene_save + 8609475112648835120
4   libobs                              0x0000000105846784 obs_source_save + 180
5   libobs                              0x0000000105851324 obs_save_source + 268
6   libobs                              0x0000000105851654 obs_save_sources_filtered + 164

graphic thread
0   libsystem_kernel.dylib              0x0000000183baebc8 __psynch_mutexwait + 8
1   libsystem_pthread.dylib             0x0000000183be90c4 _pthread_mutex_firstfit_lock_wait + 84
2   libsystem_pthread.dylib             0x6b1a800183be6a5c _pthread_mutex_firstfit_lock_slow + 7717621648941121784
3   libobs                              0x80550001058412a4 obs_source_get_width + 9247297409875181624
4   libobs                              0x0000000105837f30 update_transforms_and_prune_sources + 432
5   libobs                              0x000000010583101c scene_video_render + 96
6   libobs                              0x0000000105840b48 source_render + 316
7   libobs                              0x0000000105841208 obs_source_video_render + 948
```

For better understanding, I made an illustration to show the process, hope it helps.

![image](https://github.com/obsproject/obs-studio/assets/4487505/99df4558-d230-4c84-b451-2d9b5cbaa389)
